entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dalhousie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 07:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -15.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
